availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Anne B. Spalding. Father of Allethan Spalding, John H. Spalding, Margaret A. Spalding, and William A. Spalding. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned 13 enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 57.
Find A Grave, "Samuel P. Spalding (September 28, 1825-April 27, 1906)," Memorial #106107727, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/106107727 (accessed May 10, 2018).
